rComments: Very generous with grading, slightly confusing. He does not get very excited or shows much interest in the subject, but it is stats so who can blame him. He did an excellent job of making a non-intuitive subject easy to understand for many people. When it comes to exams, dont try to wing it. Very little textbook use, so attend sections and lecture

Teacher was pretty bad.  Got to the point where if I went to class I left knowing less than I came into with.  That being said the material is not too difficult.  Can pretty easily teach yourself with the help of a decent TA.  I also suggest checking out MIT's Probability on Itunes U.

His lectures are horribly long-winded, but the class itself is relatively easy. The exam/quiz problems are almost entirely based on the homework assignments. As long as you occasionally attend class, check the website for the chapter summaries or do the homework (or find the solutions online) you'll easily pass this class.
It is not a hard stats class and his exams & homework are fair. Just go to office hours and you will be fine. He recycles questions on his previous exams so study those too.

Absolutely awful. Not only is a jerk when you approach him for help, but he unnecessarily complicates the lesson on a daily basis. I got help in the class from a math whiz who explained to me that the concepts were actually much SIMPLER than the way in which the professor presented them. You know that's a bad sign. Avoid, avoid, avoid.

Class was surprisingly easy. Basic probability problems. He does kind of complicate things but when you just step back and look at the actual calculations they make sense and aren't that hard. He doesn't want to hear about any grade questions, kind of a jerk. Interesting class if you like probability, I enjoyed it.
THIS IS THE WORST PROFESSOR EVER! He may not give homework, but his tests are completely irrelevant to the information he gives you in class. Do not waste your time taking this class.

Horrible teacher. Cannot understand him and he over-complicates problems needlessly. Had a tutor for the class (only reason I managed to pass) who couldn't even follow the professor's though process. Don't take the class unless you know the material before-hand and REALLY don't take it for the GE.

Not kidding when I tell you he's the worst professor I've had so far. Really hard to understand him sometimes, so unless you already know statistics, this class will not be a cake-walk. Very boring lecturer. Do not take this class for the GE unless you know what you're getting in to.

People dont realize how easy he is ecuase no one can understand him. he covers things at least three times in a row. if you pay attention you'll learn. plus stats is pretty easy anyways. havent done ANY homework or reading, have a solid A.

Great, if you already know the material and don't need any kind of support or guidance whatsoever. Otherwise, watch out. If you're not a math whiz, unless you plan to attend every class, sit in the front row each time, AND do outside research, you're screwed for this class. Don't take it for the GE like I did. Not worth the pain.

Do not need to go to class because he lectures straight from the book. Nothing is too hard, just a matter of making sure you understand the material. He is not hard but he is not easy. He accent is really strong, so watch out. He likes to say "basically" a lot.
I wanna give him a 1 for clarity, but considered there isn't a "0" for my other professor, he gets a 2.

Taking stats right now and he is an extremely boring lecturer. I never go to section but as long as your read through the chapter on your own and pick up the concepts, you'll do fine.  Quizzes are pretty easy.

Kottas' class is utterly ridiculous. He truly ruined stats for me. His lectures make no sense whatsoever, and he will bore you to sleep. Also, he crams in a bunch of material right before the final. Not cool. You're much better off studying independently and attending section.

Who said these lectures are good is a monkey, the lectures are confusing and more or less out of the book. Although he is an animated teacher, the subject is drowning. I have a major complaint though, he just added 1/4th of the class material to the last week of the class. He should learn to pace himself better.
Assigned a good textbook.  Read it.  The lectures are worthless, don't go.  Don't know about sections, I never went.
omg this class...all i can say really is the lectures are way boring. go to section because it'll make more sense there. nice guy, WAY boring lectures.
